overview: Co-founder of blueKiwi Software & groupe Reflect. Graduated from Centrale Nantes (France) After more than a decade in web consulting and web application design, I’m now leading the product strategy of blueKiwi Software to bring social computing to the business world. My main focus is to understand how people work, learn and create together. It’s a combination of technologies, social interaction design and usability, all that things that help blueKiwi software to build a product that fulfils the needs of every modern organisation.
